title: ICYMI - I Apologize for Talking While You Were Talking - Sports News That's Still Out There
itunes:title: ICYMI - I Apologize for Talking While You Were Talking - Sports News That's Still Out There
description:
Roy Wood Jr. and Michael Kosta discuss the Michael Jordan docuseries "The Last Dance," baseball's odd return in South Korea and Taiwan, and a Tom Brady-Rob Gronkowski reunion.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
